text: ioneuroblastoma - Ganglioneuroma - Heterogeneous - Horner syndrome - Hypertension - Incomplete penetrance - Myoclonus - Neuroblastoma - Opsoclonus - Skin nodule - Spinal cord compression - Sporadic - Weight loss - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rough estimate of the percentage
